meanings.definition: A person with whom one exchanges letters or emails, typically someone in a foreign country.
meanings.sent1: My penfriends from Japan send me letters with beautiful stamps.
meanings.sent2: I have penfriends in different countries whom I write to regularly.
meanings.sent3: My penfriends and I pretend to be secret agents in our letters.
meanings.sent4: Having penfriends is like having windows to different parts of the world.
meanings.sent5: The idea of penfriends makes the world feel smaller and more connected.

meanings.definition: The act of corresponding with someone through written communication.
meanings.sent1: Penfriends help me practice my writing skills in a fun way.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the art of penfriends as it keeps me connected to distant friends.
meanings.sent3: My penfriends challenge me to write better and more creatively.
meanings.sent4: The concept of penfriends is like having a personal writing buddy.
meanings.sent5: Writing to penfriends feels like sending a piece of my heart across the world.
